actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

official_title: To amend the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to permit the District of Columbia to establish the rate of pay of the Chief Financial Officer of the District of Columbia.
short_title: District of Columbia Chief Financial Officer Salary Home Rule Act
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text:
District of Columbia Chief Financial Officer Salary Home Rule Act

This bill revises the pay of the Chief Financial Officer of the District of Columbia to establish it at the greater of (1) the current rate; or (2) a rate established by the District, except that any rate established by this bill shall not be reduced during the officer's tenure.

titles.title: District of Columbia Chief Financial Officer Salary Home Rule Act
To amend the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to permit the District of Columbia to establish the rate of pay of the Chief Financial Officer of the District of Columbia.
